full_summary:
------------

### Shell and Tube Heat Exchangers - PW-GC-070

#### Specification

* **Title Eng**: Shell and Tube Heat Exchangers
* **Title Fra**: Échangeurs de chaleur à tubes et à calandre

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: PW-MCT-050-6249
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: W6898-230599/A
* **Publication Date**: August 31, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 6, 2022
* **Expected Contract Start/End Date**: N/A

#### Status and Categories

* **Status Eng**: Expired
* **Status Fra**: Expiré
* **GSIN**: N4420C (Heat Exchangers)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (G)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Location

* **Delivery Location**: 5th Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown, Oromocto, New Brunswick
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2

#### Contacts and Requirements

* **Contact Name and Email**: Mathieu Gagnon, mathieu.gagnon2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone and Fax**: (343) 571-8220, (506) 851-6759
* **Bid Submission**: Electronic bids are encouraged, with facsimile or identified on-site bid drop box as alternative options.
* **Delivery Date Range**: Items must be delivered within 5 days.

#### Important Notice to Suppliers

* This solicitation is part of PSPC's Contract Modernization Initiative. For more information, refer to [Contract Modernization Initiative](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/contract-modernization-initiative).
* Due to the COVID-19 pandemic and limited staff, bidders are encouraged to prefer electronic bids or facsimile transmission over hand-delivery.

#### Contractual Conditions

* **Standard Terms and Conditions**: Can be viewed at [Standard Acquisition Clauses
